unnormalised: Arrey yaar, USD to INR rate ₹82 thavn ₹83.5 zaunk 2 dis lagle, mhunntlear mhaka zaite poixe bhogosle! Mhaka mhujem $500 last week-uch convert korunk zai aslem.
normalised: Arrey yaar, mhojem khup poiso buddonk pavlem je U-S-D ani I-N-R hacho rate rupee eighty two thaun rupee eighty three point five itlo don disanim vaddo! Mhojem dollar panch she last week-ich badal korunk zai aslem.
text: Arrey yaar, USD to INR rate ₹82 thavn ₹83.5 zaunk 2 dis lagle, mhunntlear mhaka zaite poixe bhogosle! Mhaka mhujem $500 last week-uch convert korunk zai aslem.
